title: Unmasking Clever Hans predictors and assessing what machines really learn

tldr.text: The authors investigate how these methods approach learning in order to assess the dependability of their decision making and propose a semi-automated Spectral Relevance Analysis that provides a practically effective way of characterizing and validating the behavior of nonlinear learning machines.
